title: Borderlands 2 v1.0-Update 4 5 6 Plus 26 Trainer
description:
Borderlands 2 v1.0-Update 4 5 6 Plus 26 Trainer

                                    <a href=" http://bayimg.com/PafFAAAep" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://bayimg.com/PafFAAAep</a>

                               Info: http://bayimg.com/pAffdaaep    
                                                         
                       Trainer+Info: http://bayimg.com/PaffEaAEp


Note : the Updates Are referring to The SKIDROW Updates   

((If you have installed SKIDROW Update 4 Use 

Borderlands 2 v1.0-Update 4 Plus 26 Trainer And so on ))  


how to use : 1- run game
 
             2- in game Click on Alt+Tab to minimize

             3- click the Borderlands 2 Trainer go back to the game

             4- in game click on the numpad keys to activate the cheats     


The cheats   numpad 1- infinite Health

             numpad 2- infinite Money

             numpad 3- infinite Ammo/Grenades

             numpad 4- No Reload

             numpad 5- Increase Experiences
            
             CTR-L +5- infinite Experiences

             numpad 6- infinite Skillpoints

             CTR-L +6- Reset Skillpoints
             
             numpad 7- infinite Badass Token

             numpad 8- Super Accuraccy

             numpad 9- Skill No Cooldown

             numpad 0- One Hit Kills

             numpad +- Add Money

             numpad -- Reset Skills

             numpad .- Rapid Fire

             F1 - Infinite Shield

             F2 - Super Speed
          
             F3 - Super Jump

             F4 - Enemy Can't Move 

             F5 - Freeze Skillponits & Badass Token

             F6 - Infinite Eridiums

             F7 - No Recoil

             F8 - Max Bonus Stats

             F9 - Remove All Bonus Stats

             F10- Max Inventory Space

             F11- Infinite Golden Keys

             F12- Infinite Mission Timer

             Home   -- Disable All	

 Bonus Borderlands 2 HD Wallpaper
